ChatPage.default_welcome_message: How can we help you? You can start a conversation below or start with popular questions:
ChatPage.default_error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.
ChatPage.connecting_to_agent: Connecting you with a live agent...
ChatPage.idle_message: We are here to help you. Please ask a question.
ChatPage.idle_message_with_survey: Thank you for reaching out. Can you please fill out this [survey]({url}{urlParams}) to tell us about your experience?

ChatPage.chat_queue_position_next: You are next in line in the queue. Your agent will be with you shortly.
ChatPage.chat_queue_position_in_queue: You are in the queue. Please wait for the next available agent.

ChatPage.chat_queue_position_estimated_wait_time_: Your estimated wait time is {estimatedWaitTime} second.
